citation: Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Amendment (Regulated Activities) Regulations 2016 (Tas)
text:
Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Amendment (Regulated Activities) Regulations 2016

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following regulations under the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Act 2013 .

4 April 2016

C. WARNER

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

DR VANESSA GOODWIN

Minister for Justice

PART 1 - Preliminary

1. Short title
    These regulations may be cited as the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Amendment (Regulated Activities) Regulations 2016 .

2. Commencement
        (1) Except as provided by this regulation, these regulations take effect on 1 May 2016.
        (2) Part 3 takes effect on 1 August 2016.

PART 2 - Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Regulations 2014 Amended

3.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Regulations 2014 .

4.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Regulations 2014 .

5.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Regulations 2014 .

6.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Regulations 2014 .

7.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Regulations 2014 .

8.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Regulations 2014 .

PART 3 - Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Regulations 2014 Further Amended

9. Principal Regulations
    In this Part, the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Regulations 2014 are referred to as the Principal Regulations.

10.
    The amendment effected by this regulation has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Regulations 2014 .

PART 4 - Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Amendment Regulations 2015 Amended

11.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Amendment Regulations 2015 .

12.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Amendment Regulations 2015 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 13 April 2016

These regulations are administered in the Department of Justice.
